text: At Qubit Pharmaceuticals

Our mission is clear, 
innovate in drug design

thanks to quantum technologies,
to find better treatments

for pathological targets
difficult to address.

for pathological targets
difficult to address.

We combine quantum science
and artificial intelligence

powered by computer science, 
high-performance and quantum computing

in order to find new treatments
for patients.

Our drug discovery platform
of medicines

allows us to model targets and
molecules with an unparalleled precision,

which facilitates the identification
of innovative drug candidates.
AWS, allowed us to access
the necessary computing power

to initiate the development
of this platform,

as well as our first programmes
of drug discovery.

We continue today
to work with AWS,

to have access to new machines
such as quantum computers.

By exploiting the potential
of complex target therapy,

our technologies will broaden the path
to innovative treatments

that could benefit millions 
of people around the world.

that could benefit millions 
of people around the world.

We are not only developing
drugs faster,

we're also creating more efficient
and accessible therapies.
